CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The HOMO of PCDSeBT is well - distributed along the conjugated chains ; its LUMO is mainly centralized on BT accepting core as shaped by orbital lobes , being predicted a p - type organic semiconductor.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Material Name" entities:

1. PCDSeBT - This is the name of the material being discussed, which is an organic semiconductor.
2. HOMO - The abbreviation "HOMO" stands for "Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital," which refers to the highest energy molecular orbital in the material.
3. LUMO - The abbreviation "LUMO" stands for "Lowest Unoccupied Molecular Orbital," which refers to the lowest energy molecular orbital in the material.
4. BT - This is the chemical symbol for boron, which is one of the atoms in the material.

So, the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are:

1. PCDSeBT
2. HOMO
3. LUMO
4. BT
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Of course! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph after removing the irrelevant entities:

1. PCDSeBT

So, the only "Material Name" entity in the paragraph is "PCDSeBT".

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid "Material Name" entities in the paragraph as a Markdown table:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PCDSeBT |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The HOMO of PCDSeBT is well - distributed along the conjugated chains ; its LUMO is mainly centralized on BT accepting core as shaped by orbital lobes , being predicted a p - type organic semiconductor.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Property Name" entities:

1. HOMO (Hydrogen-bonded Organic Molecular Orbital) - mentioned in the first sentence as the "Property Name" of PCDSeBT.
2. LUMO (Lowest Unoccupied Molecular Orbital) - mentioned in the second sentence as the "Property Name" of BT (Boron Tolyl).

Therefore, the two "Property Name" entities in the paragraph are:

1. HOMO (of PCDSeBT)
2. LUMO (of BT)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Sure, here are the relevant entities in the paragraph that refer to material properties:

1. HOMO (Hydrogen-bonded Organic Molecular Orbital) - refers to the material property of the electronic structure of PCDSeBT.
2. LUMO (Lowest Unoccupied Molecular Orbital) - refers to the material property of the electronic structure of BT (Boron Tolyl).

So, the two relevant entities in the paragraph that refer to material properties are:

1. HOMO
2. LUMO

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to material properties, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| HOMO |
| LUMO |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The HOMO of PCDSeBT is well - distributed along the conjugated chains ; its LUMO is mainly centralized on BT accepting core as shaped by orbital lobes , being predicted a p - type organic semiconductor.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following entities can be identified as "Property Value" entities:

1. HOMO (Hydrogen-bonded Organic Molecular Orbital): This is a property value that refers to the distribution of electrons in the molecule along the conjugated chains.
2. LUMO (Lowest Unoccupied Molecular Orbital): This is another property value that refers to the location of the electrons in the molecule, specifically the position of the lowest unoccupied molecular orbital.
3. p-type organic semiconductor: This is a property value that refers to the type of semiconductor material, specifically a p-type material, which has an excess of holes (positive charge carriers) over electrons (negative charge carriers).

So, the three "Property Value" entities in the given paragraph are:

1. HOMO
2. LUMO
3. p-type organic semiconductor
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Of course! Here are the entities that refer to the value of material properties in the given paragraph:

1. HOMO (Hydrogen-bonded Organic Molecular Orbital)
2. LUMO (Lowest Unoccupied Molecular Orbital)

These two entities refer to the energy levels of the molecule, which is a material property.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to material properties, presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| HOMO |
| LUMO |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
